basics.name: Mecca Gonzalez
basics.label: Azure Administrator
basics.summary: I am testing out codespaces in Github to learn how to do version control on the cloud. Cloud is definitely the future.

work.name: Pixel Health
work.summary: I supported healthcare applications for a Level I Trauma Center in Western Massachusetts.
highlights: Being able to provide connection to critical systems that effects patients in a positive way whilst collaborating with an amazing team.

volunteer.summary: I use my home lab to practice concepts with cloud computing.
highlights: You'll be surprised on roadblocks you'll overcome, if what you're doing really matters to you.
